title: Bedtime Planner
description: Calculate ideal sleep or wake times based on 90-minute sleep cycles.
helper: Assumes it takes about 15 minutes to fall asleep.

tips.title: Sleep tips
items: Keep a consistent sleep schedule when possible.
Avoid caffeine for 6 hours before bedtime.
Dim the lights and screen brightness in the evening.
Aim for 4–6 cycles (6–9 hours) for most adults.
